name: Parsec lost in space
description:
Parsec is an arcade-style spaceship game where the only thing you can rely on is your ship's movement and your reflexes.
With the main objective of offering you an addictive challenge with beautiful graphics made in pixel art and a unique gameplay mechanic.
Asteroids, bombs and aliens are some of the obstacles that we will encounter on our way back home. But remember! No guns, we're just researchers!
So? Will you face the challenge and become the star fighter?
